title: Problems with Ping
body: Hello, i'm from Croatia and i'm having trouble playing on OCE servers, is there any way i could transfer to EUNE because this is unplayable, also i have problems because after 3 years there is still no refferal service on OCE servers while i had 100+ on EUNE, thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Sophos,

The Refer-A-Friend system is no longer active, as far as I'm aware. However, if you'd like to transfer to EUNE, unfortunately the only way to do so is to purchase an account transfer from the PVP.net Store. There aren't any free transfers going on, and it doesn't look like free transfers between the two servers will be offered in the foreseeable future. Sorry about that.
